Articles.Content:
//SOLVED - watch 2nd post//

Hello,

I didn't play for months and decided to start a new game with KSP 0.24.2 (32 bits). I dld the game and ran it.

But it loads for so looooong (+-15 min with stock version).... With same PC, I used to load previous KSP version very quickly.

I checked "know issues" thread and didn't get a clue.

Am I the only one?

Any tips plz?

PS: I can read files read by computer... Ex: "squad/flags/orbs" stays for 2-3 sec.)

PS2: I used to have Hamachi for a while and uninstalled it. Hamachi seems to put in trouble... I check things...

Edited September 8, 2014 by brienne
solved

Got it.

Hamachi put the mess, even if i uninstalled it.

Went in "control panel" things. Found "Hamachi" related to a home connexion. ->"Disable"*

->Restart KSP.... and it loads like hell. Can't read files anymore^^

So.... check your panel config if you used Hamachi.

Edited September 8, 2014 by brienne
